1111010111000101 0101110100110111 1 -> sum: 0101001011111101, cout: 1
0101001001101101 0011101010000011 1 -> sum: 1000110011110001, cout: 0
0111000010001000 0011100111110111 0 -> sum: 1010101001111111, cout: 0
0011011100011100 0111010000000100 0 -> sum: 1010101100100000, cout: 0
0101110000111100 0000011010010001 0 -> sum: 0110001011001101, cout: 0
0011100110111101 0100111101111010 0 -> sum: 1000100100110111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
